Title: Montoir, Fos Cavaou continue to keep more than half of France’s LNG import capacity offline
Description: The recent return to operations of France’s 1.2 mtpa Fos Tonkin LNG receiving terminal after a month-long strike-induced shutdown has contributed to the country’s LNG receipts this month. But, over half its import capacity is still offline with two terminals yet to receive cargoes.
Author: CK

Title: Gail seeks one second-half May cargo for Dhamra; terminal commissioning seen on track
Description: India’s state-owned gas distributor Gail is seeking one cargo for delivery in the second half of May to the Adani Total-operated 5 mtpa Dhamra LNG receiving terminal currently undergoing commissioning. The tender closes today.
Author: CK
